name: Koda
text: TELL EVERYBODY During opponents' turns, you can't lose lore.
flavor_text: "I mean, I don't want to brag or nothing, but I got some moves."

name: Nala
flavor_text: The Lorcana Hide-and-Seek Championship was hers for the taking.

name: Prince Naveen
text:
Singer 6 (This character counts as cost 6 to sing songs.)
IT'S BEAUTIFUL, NO? When you play this character, you may play a song with cost 6 or less for free.

name: Rutt
text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
flavor_text: "Let's find some nice twigs, eh? I could use a snack!"

name: Kenai
text: BROTHERS FOREVER While this character is exerted, your characters named Koda can't be challenged.
flavor_text:
"You have to look after your little brother, no matter how big a pain he is."
-Kenai

name: Vanellope von Schweetz
flavor_text: "Look, the code may say I'm a princess, but I know who I really am..."

name: Tuke
flavor_text: "I'd love a snack, but I'm kinda tied up right now."

name: Lilo
text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
flavor_text: "Peanut butter and pineapple! This'll be the best cake ever!"

name: Vanellope von Schweetz
text: YOU'VE GOT TO PAY TO PLAY Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character gets -1 {S} until the start of your next turn.
flavor_text: "I'll take whatever you've got...as long as it's got sugar in it."

name: Fix-It Felix, Jr.
text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
flavor_text: "Golly, this place is going to take some real fixing!"

name: Gazelle
text: Singer 5 (This character counts as cost 5 to sing songs.)
flavor_text: "Good evening, Lorcana! We are here tonight to celebrate the possibilities that open up to us when we unite."

name: Fix-It Felix, Jr.
text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Fix-It Felix, Jr.)
BUILDING TOGETHER Your locations get +2 {W}.

name: Kristoff
text:
SONG OF THE HERD For each song card in your discard, you pay 1 {I} less to play this character.
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

name: Mirabel Madrigal
text: NOT WITHOUT MY FAMILY You can't play this character unless you have 5 or more characters in play.
flavor_text: "There's nothing we can't accomplish together!"

name: Minnie Mouse
text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Minnie Mouse.)
PARADE ORDER When you play this character, if you used Shift to play her, you may search your deck for a character card and reveal that card to all players. Shuffle your deck and put that card on top of it.

name: Daisy Duck
text: BIG PRIZE Whenever this character quests, each opponent reveals the top card of their deck. If it's a character card, they may put it into their hand. Otherwise, they put it on the bottom of their deck.

name: Fix-It Felix, Jr.
text: OH, MY LAND! When you play this character, if you have a location in play, draw a card.
flavor_text: "I don't think I've ever seen anything as sweet as this."

name: Moana
flavor_text: "Investigate every part of the Illuminary, find the chromicons, restore the Illuminary, how hard can it—wait, what was that noise?"

name: Vanellope von Schweetz
text:
Shift 2 (You may pay 2 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Vanellope von Schweetz.)
I HEREBY DECREE Whenever you play another Princess character, all opposing characters get -1 {S} until the start of your next turn.

name: Alan-a-Dale
text: FAN FAVORITE Whenever you play a song, gain 1 lore.
flavor_text: "Thank you! Now here's a little ditty for our floodborn friends that we call 'Martin and the Flood.'"

name: Wreck-It Ralph
text: I'VE GOT THE COOLEST FRIEND When you play this character, return a character card from your discard to your hand. If that card is a Princess character card, gain 2 lore.
flavor_text: If he must give a victory speech, he'll keep it brief.

name: Maid Marian
text: IF IT PLEASES THE LADY When you play this character, chosen opposing character gets -5 {S} until the start of your next turn.
flavor_text: "And who might you be, my noble knight and champion?"

name: Sven
text: REINDEER GAMES When you play this character, you may ready chosen character. They can't quest or challenge for the rest of this turn.

name: Minnie Mouse
text: PATCH THEM UP Whenever this character quests, you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.
flavor_text: "Oh my! Is that part of the Illuminary? I have to go help!"

name: Try Everything
text:
(A character with cost 4 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Remove up to 3 damage from chosen character and ready them. They can't quest or challenge for the rest of this turn.
flavor_text: I want to try even though I could fail

name: Try Everything
text:
(A character with cost 4 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Remove up to 3 damage from chosen character and ready them. They can't quest or challenge for the rest of this turn.
flavor_text: I want to try even though I could fail

name: Healing Touch
text: Remove up to 4 damage from chosen character. Draw a card.
flavor_text: "The heart is not so easily changed, but the head can be persuaded." —Grand Pabbie

name: Revive
text: Play a character card with cost 5 or less from your discard for free.
flavor_text: Not all that is lost is gone forever.

name: Blast from Your Past
text:
(A character with cost 6 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Name a card. Return all character cards with that name from your discard to your hand.

name: Blast from Your Past
text:
(A character with cost 6 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Name a card. Return all character cards with that name from your discard to your hand.

name: Invited to the Ball
text: Reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Put revealed character cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Healing Decanter
text: RENEWING ESSENCE {E} — Remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

name: Queen's Sensor Core
text:
SYMBOL OF NOBILITY At the start of your turn, if you have a Princess or Queen character in play, gain 1 lore.
ROYAL SEARCH {E}, 2 {I} — Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Princess or Queen character card, you may put it into your hand. Otherwise, put it on the top of your deck.

name: Amber Chromicon
text: AMBER LIGHT {E} — Remove up to 1 damage from each of your characters.
flavor_text:
"Comfort the weak and weary."
-Inscription

name: Rapunzel's Tower
text: SAFE AND SOUND Characters get +3 {W} while here.
flavor_text:
"It's a scary world out there."
–Mother Gothel

name: Pride Lands
text: OUR HUMBLE HOME While you have 3 or more characters here, you may banish this location to play a character from your discard for free.

name: Maleficent
text:
Shift 6 (You may pay 6 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Maleficent.)
LISTEN WELL, ALL OF YOU When you play this character, for each of your characters named Maleficent in play, return a chosen opposing character, item, or location with cost 3 or less to their player's hand.

name: The Nokk
text: TURNING TIDES When you play this character, you may move up to 2 damage counters from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

name: Cogsworth
text: TIME TO MOVE IT! When you play this character, chosen character gains Rush this turn. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)
flavor_text: "Step to it! Time is of the essence."

name: Merlin
text: GIVE ME TIME TO THINK When you play this character and when he leaves play, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one on the top of your deck and the other on the bottom.
flavor_text: "Don't rush me, now—this is important."

name: Archimedes
text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
flavor_text: "Hmph. What does an owl have to do to get a little peace and quiet around here?"

name: Bruni
text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
PARTING GIFT When this character is banished, you may draw a card.

name: Earth Giant
text: UNEARTHED When you play this character, each opponent draws a card.
flavor_text: Who woke up the big guy?

name: Gale
text: RECURRING GUST When this character is banished in a challenge, return this card to your hand.

name: White Rabbit
flavor_text: Oh me, oh my! Did a piece just fall off the Illuminary?! I've got to tell someone before it's too late, late, late!

name: Madam Mim
text:
A LITTLE GAME When you play this character, banish her or return another chosen character of yours to your hand.
SNEAKY MOVE At the start of your turn, you may move up to 2 damage counters from this character to chosen opposing character.

name: Luisa Madrigal
flavor_text: "This is just a warm-up, folks! Wait 'til you see the big finale!"

name: Anna
text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Anna.)
EXCEPTIONAL POWER When you play this character, exert all opposing characters.

name: Archimedes
text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Archimedes.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Challenger +3 (While challenging, this character gets +3 {S}.)

name: Elsa
text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
CRYSTALLIZE When you play this character, exert chosen opposing character.

name: Genie
text: PHENOMENAL SHOWMAN While this character is exerted, opposing characters can't ready at the start of their turn.
flavor_text: "Keep your eyes on me, folks! It's time for a little prestidigitation!"

name: Olaf
text:
CLEAR THE PATH For each exerted character opponents have in play, you pay 1 {I} less to play this character.
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

name: Maleficent
text: WHAT AN AWKWARD SITUATION Whenever this character quests, you may choose and discard a card to return chosen character, item, or location with cost 3 or less to their player's hand.

name: Monstro
flavor_text: The great beast breached the surface of the Azurite Sea, and the cry went out, "Monstro! Monstro!"

name: Magica De Spell
text: PLAYING WITH POWER During opponents' turns, if an effect would cause you to discard one or more cards from your hand, you don't discard.

name: Maleficent
flavor_text: "Evidently my invitation was lost. How dreadful. Here, let me help with the decorations . . ."

name: Rafiki
text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
SURPRISING SKILL When you play this character, he gains Challenger +4 this turn. (They get +4 {S} while challenging.)

name: Anna
text: GROWING POWERS When you play this character, each opponent chooses and exerts one of their ready characters.
flavor_text: "Okay, I can move small objects without any problems. I need something bigger... Where is Kristoff's sleigh?"

name: King of Hearts
text: PLEASING THE QUEEN {E} — Chosen exerted character can't ready at the start of their next turn.
flavor_text: "By order of the king. You heard what she said!"

name: Camilo Madrigal
text: IMITATE Whenever this character quests, you may gain lore equal to the {L} of chosen other character of yours. Return that character to your hand.

name: Hypnotic Strength
text: Draw a card. Chosen character gains Challenger +2 this turn. (They get +2 {S} while challenging.)
flavor_text: Suddenly, Basil felt a strong desire to find the broken crown.

name: Finders Keepers
text: Draw 3 cards.
flavor_text:
"Three wishes, comin' right up!"
- Iago

name: We Know the Way
text:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Shuffle chosen card from your discard into your deck. Reveal the top card of your deck. If it has the same name as the chosen card, you may play the revealed card for free. Otherwise, put it into your hand.

name: We Know the Way
text:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Shuffle chosen card from your discard into your deck. Reveal the top card of your deck. If it has the same name as the chosen card, you may play the revealed card for free. Otherwise, put it into your hand.

name: Gathering Knowledge and Wisdom
text: Gain 2 lore.
flavor_text: "Just think! All this knowledge was under our noses the whole time. We only had to look in the right place."

name: Magical Aid
text: Chosen character gains Challenger +3 and “When this character is banished in a challenge, return this card to your hand” this turn. (They get +3 {S} while challenging.)
flavor_text: "You've got some power in your corner now!" –Genie

name: Retrosphere
text: EXTRACT OF AMETHYST 2 {I}, Banish this item — Return chosen character, item, or location with cost 3 or less to their player's hand.

name: Half Hexwell Crown
text:
AN UNEXPECTED FIND {E}, 2 {I} — Draw a card.
A PERILOUS POWER {E}, 2 {I}, Discard a card — Exert chosen character.
flavor_text: The broken crown holds dark and mysterious powers.

name: Amethyst Chromicon
text: AMETHYST LIGHT {E} — Each player may draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Seek not power for its own sake."
– Inscription

name: Elsa's Ice Palace
text: ETERNAL WINTER When you play this location, choose an exerted character. While this location is in play, that character can't ready at the start of their turn.

name: The Library
text: LOST IN A BOOK Whenever a character is banished while here, you may draw a card.

name: Robin Hood
text:
TAG ME IN! For each 1 damage on opposing characters, you pay 1 {I} less to play this character.
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

name: Shenzi
text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
EASY PICKINGS While challenging a damaged character, this character gets +2 {S}.

name: Little John
flavor_text: "You're in for a real treat, Rob. Tonight's house special is my famous outlaw grub. Made from the finest whatever we could find!"

name: Zazu
text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
flavor_text: "Oh, I guess one quick spin through the lights won't hurt."

name: Ulf
text: SILENT PERFORMANCE This character can't {E} to sing songs.
flavor_text: His performances are unspeakably good.

name: Ed
text: CAUSE A PANIC When you play this character, you may deal 2 damage to chosen damaged character.
flavor_text: "A-heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heeee."

name: Flora
text: FIDDLE FADDLE While being challenged, this character gets +2 {S}.
flavor_text: "Don't fuss, dear! A flick of the wrist will turn these briars into something beautiful."

name: Merryweather
text: RAY OF HOPE When you play this character, you may pay 1 {I} to give chosen character +2 {S} this turn.
flavor_text: "The most beautiful color is blue!"

name: Robin Hood
text: TRICK SHOT When you play this character, if an opponent has a damaged character in play, gain 1 lore.
flavor_text: "For a second there, I thought this might be a real challenge."

name: Fauna
flavor_text: "The secret to a good cake is combining everything just right. Every ingredient is important, but the magic is in how they work together."

name: Iago
text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
IN DISGUISE Whenever this character quests, you pay 2 {I} less for the next action you play this turn.

name: Banzai
flavor_text: He will never refuse a quick bite before dinner.

name: Ed
text: ROWDY GUEST Damaged characters can't challenge this character.
flavor_text: As far as he's concerned, there's no such thing as bad taste.

name: Scroop
text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
DO SAY HELLO TO MR. ARROW When you play this character, you may pay 3 {I} to banish chosen damaged character.

name: Prince Phillip
text:
SLAYER OF DRAGONS When you play this character, banish chosen opposing Dragon character.
PRESSING THE ADVANTAGE Whenever he challenges a damaged character, ready this character after the challenge.

name: Clarabelle
text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Clarabelle.)
KEEP IN STEP At the end of your turn, if chosen opponent has more cards in their hand than you, you may draw cards until you have the same number.

name: Anna
text:
ROYAL RESOLUTION When you play this character, you may pay 2 {I} to choose one: 
• Each opponent chooses and discards a card. 
• Chosen character gets +2 {S} this turn. 
• Banish chosen damaged character.

name: Clarabelle
text: BUTTERFINGERS When you play this character, you may pay 2 {I} to banish chosen item.

name: Banzai
text: HERE KITTY, KITTY, KITTY When you play this character, you may exert chosen damaged character.
flavor_text: "What do we got here, a little snack pack?"

name: Robin Hood
text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Robin Hood.)
CLEVER PLAN This character gets +1 {L} for each opposing damaged character in play.

name: Mother Gothel
text: MOTHER KNOWS BEST When you play this character, you may pay 3 {I} to return chosen character to their player's hand.
flavor_text: A beautiful lady never stands meekly at the back of the line.

name: Clarabelle
text: ONE STEP BEHIND When you play this character, if an opponent has more cards in their hand than you, you may draw a card.
flavor_text: "Golly! Those dancers can really moo-ve!"

name: Shenzi
text:
STICK AROUND FOR DINNER This character gets +1 {S} for each other Hyena character you have in play.
WHAT HAVE WE GOT HERE? Whenever one of your Hyena characters challenges a damaged character, gain 2 lore.

name: Mother Gothel
text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Mother Gothel.)
THE WORLD IS DARK When you play this character, each opponent chooses one of their characters and returns that card to their hand.

name: Scar
text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
LIFE'S NOT FAIR, IS IT? Whenever one of your characters challenges a damaged character, you may draw a card.

name: Hypnotic Deduction
text: Draw 3 cards, then put 2 cards from your hand on the top of your deck in any order.
flavor_text: "A security device! Easily defeated, of course. Once I make room for the crown, I . . . can . . . bring . . . it . . . to . . . him."

name: Night Howler Rage
text: Draw a card. Chosen character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)
flavor_text:
"I think someone is targeting predators on purpose and making them go savage!"
— Judy Hopps

name: You're Welcome
text:
(A character with cost 4 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Shuffle chosen character, item, or location into their player's deck. That player draws 2 cards.
flavor_text: I make everything happen!

name: You're Welcome
text:
(A character with cost 4 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Shuffle chosen character, item, or location into their player's deck. That player draws 2 cards.
flavor_text: I make everything happen!

name: Remember Who You Are
text: If chosen opponent has more cards in their hand than you, draw cards until you have the same number.

name: Prince John's Mirror
text:
YOU LOOK REGAL If you have a character named Prince John in play, you pay 1 {I} less to play this item.
A FEELING OF POWER At the end of each opponent's turn, if they have more than 3 cards in their hand, they discard until they have 3 cards in their hand.

name: Obscurosphere
text: EXTRACT OF EMERALD 2 {I}, Banish this item — Your characters gain Ward until the start of your next turn. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

name: Emerald Chromicon
text: EMERALD LIGHT During opponents' turns, whenever one of your characters is banished, you may return chosen character to their player's hand.
flavor_text:
"Trust in the winds of change."
- Inscription

name: Sherwood Forest
text:
FOREST HOME Your characters named Robin Hood may move here for free.
FAMILIAR TERRAIN Characters gain Ward and “{E}, 1 {I} — Deal 2 damage to chosen damaged character” while here. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

name: Tropical Rainforest
text: SNACK TIME Opposing damaged characters gain Reckless. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

name: Taffyta Muttonfudge
flavor_text: "There's not a glimmer that can keep up with me. You might as well quit now."

name: Wreck-It Ralph
text: REFRESHING BREAK Whenever you ready this character, gain 1 lore for each 1 damage on him.

name: Maximus
text: ROYALLY BIG REWARDS At the end of your turn, if you have any characters in play with 5 {S} or more, gain 2 lore. If you have any in play with 10 {S} or more, gain 5 lore instead.
flavor_text: It's easy to get carried away when it comes to tug-of-war.

name: Turbo
text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
GAME JUMP This character also counts as being named King Candy for Shift.

name: Donald Duck
text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Donald Duck.)
HUMBLE PIE When you play this character, if you used Shift to play him, each opponent loses 2 lore.
RAGING DUCK While an opponent has 10 or more lore, this character gets +6 {S}.

name: Rancis Fluggerbutter
flavor_text: Ingredients: Butter, sugar, unsweetened chocolate, vanilla, and arrogance.

name: Scar
text: LONG LIVE THE KING When you play this character, you may banish chosen character named Mufasa.
flavor_text: The second Rule of Villainy: Never settle for second place.

name: Snowanna Rainbeau
text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
flavor_text: When it comes to racing, she never gets cold feet.

name: Daisy Duck
text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
flavor_text: She has an unblemished record.

name: Mickey Mouse
text: PERFECT PARTNERS While you have a character named Minnie Mouse in play, this character gets +2 {S}.
flavor_text: He loves to share the spotlight with a star like Minnie.

name: Ratigan
text: NOTHING CAN STAND IN MY WAY While this character has damage, he gets +2 {S}.
flavor_text: The world's most diabolical genius should never suffer such indignities!

name: Taffyta Muttonfudge
text: SHOWSTOPPER When you play this character, if you have a location in play, each opponent loses 1 lore.
flavor_text: "Never lose sight of where you're going. Second place."

name: Denahi
flavor_text: "You'll pay for what you've done! I'll track you all the way to the Azurite Sea if I have to!"

name: Pete
text: SCRAM! When you play this character, if you have another character named Pete in play, you may banish chosen opposing character.

name: Taffyta Muttonfudge
text:
Shift 2 (You may pay 2 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Taffyta Muttonfudge.)
NEW ROSTER Once per turn, when this character moves to a location, gain 2 lore.

name: Robin Hood
text: MY GREATEST PERFORMANCE Whenever this character quests, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal an action card with cost 6 or less and play it for free. Put the rest in your discard.

name: Gaston
text:
A MAN AMONG MEN! For each damaged character you have in play, you pay 2 {I} less to play this character.
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

name: Pete
flavor_text: His half-baked scheme to whisk away the food almost worked. But in the end, he got his just desserts.

name: Arthur
text: Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)
flavor_text: "Hold it, boy. Not so fast." -Merlin

name: Donald Duck
text: PLUCKY PLAY Whenever this character challenges another character, each opponent loses 1 lore.
flavor_text: He keeps his eye on the prize.

name: Ratigan
text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Ratigan.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
DELIGHTFULLY WICKED Your damaged characters get +2 {S}.

name: Vanellope von Schweetz
text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
PIXLEXIA When you play this character, she gains Evasive until the start of your next turn. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

name: Simba
text: I LAUGH IN THE FACE OF DANGER When you play this character, chosen character gets +2 {S} this turn.

name: Minnie Mouse
text: DANCE-OFF Whenever this character or one of your characters named Mickey Mouse challenges another character, gain 1 lore.
flavor_text: She doesn't seek the spotlight—the spotlight seeks her.

name: Break Free
text: Deal 1 damage to chosen character of yours. They gain Rush and get +1 {S} this turn. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)
flavor_text: Tink darted from the shattered lantern in the blink of an eye.

name: Evil Comes Prepared
text: Ready chosen character of yours. They can't quest for the rest of this turn. If a Villain character is chosen, gain 1 lore.

name: Don't Let the Frostbite Bite
text:
(A character with cost 7 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Ready all your characters. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.
flavor_text: Let's call it a night

name: Don't Let the Frostbite Bite
text:
(A character with cost 7 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Ready all your characters. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.
flavor_text: Let's call it a night

name: Glimmer vs Glimmer
text: Banish chosen character of yours to banish chosen character.
flavor_text: Hades: "Listen, kid. If I'm gettin' banished back to the lorebook, you're going with me." Hercules: "We'll see about that."

name: Who's With Me?
text:
Your characters get +2 {S} this turn.
Whenever one of your characters with Reckless challenges another character this turn, gain 2 lore.
flavor_text: "Don't forget, the purple unicorn is mine!"

name: Potion of Might
text: VILE CONCOCTION 1 {I}, Banish this item — Chosen character gets +3 {S} this turn. If a Villain character is chosen, they get +4 {S} instead.

name: The Sword Released
text: POWER APPOINTED At the start of your turn, if you have a character in play with more {S} than each opposing character in play, each opponent loses 1 lore and you gain lore equal to the lore lost.

name: Ruby Chromicon
text: RUBY LIGHT {E} — Chosen character gets +1 {S} this turn.
flavor_text:
"Leave fear behind."
– Inscription

name: Sugar Rush Speedway
text: ON YOUR MARKS! Once per turn, you may {E} chosen character here and deal them 1 damage to move them to another location for free.

name: Ratigan's Party
text: MISFITS' REVELRY While you have a damaged character here, this location gets +2 {L}.

name: King Candy
flavor_text: "My sweet subjects, I can without a pinch of hesitation assure you that I have never been so happy."

name: Chaca
flavor_text: "Look, look! My tooth is even looser today!"

name: The Queen
text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
flavor_text: She'd seen what the ink could do for other glimmers. What could it do for her?

name: Scrooge McDuck
flavor_text: "The secret room should be right here! Ach, I cannot believe I paid a whole penny for this map."

name: Prince John
text: TAXES NEVER FAIL ME Whenever you play an item, this character gets +2 {S} this turn.
flavor_text: "Of course I'm on the list. Check under 'PJ.'"

name: Merlin
text: LONG LIVE THE KING! Your characters named Arthur gain Resist +1. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)
flavor_text: "A little peace and quiet will do your health good, boy."

name: Pacha
text:
HELPFUL SUPPLIES At the start of your turn, if you have an item in play, gain 1 lore.
PERFECT DIRECTIONS At the start of your turn, if you have a location in play, gain 1 lore.

name: The Queen
text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named The Queen.)
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
REFLECTIONS OF VANITY For each other character named The Queen you have in play, this character gets +1 {L}.

name: Sheriff of Nottingham
text:
EVERY LITTLE BIT HELPS For each item you have in play, you pay 1 {I} less to play this character.
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)

name: Chicha
text:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
ONE ON THE WAY During your turn, when you put a card into your inkwell, if it's the second card you've put into your inkwell this turn, you may draw a card.

name: Prince John
text: BEAUTIFUL, LOVELY TAXES {E} — Play an item from your hand or discard with cost 5 or less for free, exerted.
flavor_text: A villainous schemer from day to night.

name: The Queen
text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
GATHERER OF THE WICKED When you play this character, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may reveal any number of character cards named The Queen and put them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Kuzco
text:
OUTPLACEMENT When you play this character, you may put chosen item or location into its player's inkwell facedown and exerted.
BY INVITE ONLY 4 {I} — Your other characters gain Resist +1 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

name: Mufasa
text:
A DELICATE BALANCE When you play this character, exert all cards in your inkwell, then return 2 cards at random from your inkwell to your hand.
EVERYTHING THE LIGHT TOUCHES Whenever this character quests, ready all cards in your inkwell.

name: Ludwig von Drake
flavor_text: "So you see, there's a dark void at the edge of Lorcana. A complete absence of electromagnetic radiation! What's it made of? I don't know! The light's just gone. Kaput!"

name: Minnie Mouse
text: CAKE CATAPULT When you play this character, chosen character gets -2 {S} this turn.
flavor_text: This puts the Frosting Flinger 2000 to shame.

name: Basil
text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
flavor_text:
"This case is as good as solved!"
-Basil

name: King Candy
text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named King Candy.)
CHANGING THE CODE When you play this character, you may draw 2 cards, then put a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck.

name: Donald Duck
text: BAFFLING MYSTERY When you play this character, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
flavor_text: There's just gotta be one of those chromi-thingies around here somewhere!

name: Tanana
text: YOUR BROTHERS NEED GUIDANCE When you play this character, you may remove up to 1 damage from chosen character or location.

name: Tipo
text: MEASURE ME AGAIN When you play this character, you may put a card from your hand into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
flavor_text: "Mom, Mom! I think I'm still growing!"

name: Belle
text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
USHERED INTO THE PARTY When you play this character, your other characters gain Ward until the start of your next turn.

name: Merlin
text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Merlin.)
OVERDEVELOPED BRAIN When you play this character, if you used Shift to play him, you may search your deck for any card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle your deck.

name: Vision of the Future
text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
flavor_text: "We must repair the Illuminary before it's too late. And we'll need these devices, these chromicons, to fix it."

name: Royal Tantrum
text: Banish any number of your items, then draw a card for each item banished this way.
flavor_text: "I am King! King! King!"

name: Ever as Before
text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Remove up to 2 damage from any number of chosen characters.
flavor_text:
It will surprise you
Just like the sun from the east

name: Ever as Before
text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Remove up to 2 damage from any number of chosen characters.
flavor_text:
It will surprise you
Just like the sun from the east

name: Hide Away
text: Put chosen item or location into its player's inkwell facedown and exerted.
flavor_text:
Fauna: "Oh my! We dropped some ..."
Merryweather: "You mean you dropped some!"

name: All Funned Out
text: Put chosen character of yours into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
flavor_text: "Pretty pathetic, huh?"

name: Medal of Heroes
text: CONGRATULATIONS, SOLDIER {E}, 2 {I}, Banish this item — Chosen character of yours gets +2 {L} this turn.
flavor_text:
"You have etched in the rock of virtue a legacy beyond compare."
- General Hologram

name: Basil's Magnifying Glass
text: FIND WHAT'S HIDDEN {E}, 2 {I} — Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may reveal an item card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
flavor_text: 'I say, a piece of the Hexwell Crown!' – Basil

name: Merlin's Carpetbag
text: HOCKETY POCKETY {E}, 1 {I} — Return an item card from your discard to your hand.
flavor_text: 'What a way to pack!' – Arthur

name: Sapphire Chromicon
text:
POWERING UP This item enters play exerted.
SAPPHIRE LIGHT {E}, 2 {I}, Banish one of your items — Gain 2 lore.
flavor_text:
"Knowledge is eternal."
-Inscription

name: The Great Illuminary
text: WARM WELCOME Characters with Support get +1 {L} and +2 {W} while here.
flavor_text: Every surface glows with the joy of celebration.

name: Merlin's Cottage
text: KNOWLEDGE IS POWER Each player plays with the top card of their deck face up.

name: Stitch
text: HEAVE HO! When you play this character, you may deal 2 damage to chosen character.
flavor_text: He's not the biggest glimmer on the team, but he still packs a wallop.

name: Jafar
text:
Challenger +7 (While challenging, this character gets +7 {S}.)
INTIMIDATING GAZE Opposing characters with cost 4 or less can't challenge.
flavor_text: No one will keep me from the broken crown!

name: Simba
text: FACE THE PAST During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may draw a card.
flavor_text: "This is my kingdom. If I don't fight for it, who will?"

name: Rudy
flavor_text: "The Illusionary can't handle this much groove! We have to keep the noise down or it'll fall apart for sure!"

name: Royal Guard
flavor_text: "Hey, I've been turned into a cow. Can I go home?"

name: Mickey Mouse
text: Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)
flavor_text: Underestimating him is a recipe for disaster.

name: Sleepy
text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

name: Kronk
text: Challenger +1 (While challenging, this character gets +1 {S}.)
flavor_text: "Maybe *this* one's a chromicon. Probably not. I really should have paid more attention when that wizard guy was talking . . ."

name: HeiHei
text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
flavor_text: Who's the 'boat snack' now?!

name: Sneezy
text: HEADWIND When you play this character, chosen Knight character gains Challenger +2 this turn. (They get +2 {S} while challenging.)

name: Dopey
text: STRONGER TOGETHER When you play this character, if you have another Knight character in play, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character or location.

name: Namaari
text:
I DON'T HAVE ANY OTHER CHOICE For each opposing character banished in a challenge this turn, you pay 2 {I} less to play this character.
Resist +3 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 3.)

name: Snow White
text: NATURAL LEADER This character gains Resist +1 for each other Knight character you have in play. (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1 for each other Knight.)
flavor_text: Friendship is the best armor of all.

name: Yzma
text: I'M WARNING YOU! During your turn, whenever one of your characters banishes a character in a challenge, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character.
flavor_text: "What do you mean, 'not on the list'?! I told you to always put me on the list!"

name: Kronk
text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Kronk.)
ARE YOU ON THE LIST? During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may play a character with cost 5 or less for free.

name: Grumpy
text:
BOON OF RESILIENCE While one of your Knight characters is at a location, that character gains Resist +2. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)
BURST OF SPEED During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

name: Pete
text: RE-PETE {E} - Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a character card named Pete, you may play it for free.
flavor_text: He'll have you seeing double.

name: Sir Ector
flavor_text: "Well, by Jove. Don't just stand there. Raise a glass to my son Kay...and may we be rid of the trickster wizard Marvin, or whatever his blasted name was."

name: Bashful
text: IMPRESS THE PRINCESS While you have a character named Snow White in play, this character gains Bodyguard. (An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

name: Arthur
flavor_text:
"That boy's got real spark. Lots of spirit. Throws himself heart and soul into everything he does."
–Merlin

name: Happy
text: BURST OF SPEED During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

name: Simba
text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Simba.)
FEARSOME ROAR When you play this character, you may banish chosen item or location.

name: Doc
text: DRASTIC MEASURES When you play this character, you may discard your hand to draw 2 cards.

name: Arthur
text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Arthur.)
KNIGHTED BY THE KING When you play this character, chosen character gains Challenger +2 and Resist +2 and can challenge ready characters this turn. (They get +2 {S} while challenging. Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

name: Pete
text: BLOW THE WHISTLE When you play this character, opponents can't play actions until the start of your next turn.
flavor_text: "It ain't cheatin' if you're the one makin' the rules."

name: Tug-of-War
text:
Choose one:
• Deal 1 damage to each opposing character without Evasive.
• Deal 3 damage to each opposing character with Evasive.

name: When Will My Life Begin?
text:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Chosen character can't challenge during their next turn. Draw a card.
flavor_text: Stuck in the same place I've always been...

name: When Will My Life Begin?
text:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Chosen character can't challenge during their next turn. Draw a card.
flavor_text: Stuck in the same place I've always been...

name: Duck for Cover!
text: Chosen character gains Resist +1 and Evasive this turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1. They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

name: Food Fight!
text: Your characters gain “{E}, 1 {I} — Deal 1 damage to chosen character” this turn.
flavor_text: "Gawrsh, who ordered the...upside-down CAA-AA-AKE?"

name: Shield of Arendelle
text: DEFLECT Banish this item — Chosen character gains Resist +1 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

name: Plate Armor
text: WELL CRAFTED {E} — Chosen character gains Resist +2 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

name: Steel Chromicon
text: STEEL LIGHT {E} — Deal 1 damage to chosen character.
flavor_text:
"Strong in will, strong in battle."
– Inscription

name: Bad-Anon
text: THERE'S NO ONE I'D RATHER BE THAN ME Villain characters gain “{E}, 3 {I} — Play a character with the same name as this character for free” while here.

name: Seven Dwarfs' Mine
text: MOUNTAIN DEFENSE During your turn, the first time you move a character here, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character. If the moved character is a Knight, deal 2 damage instead.

name: Prince Naveen
text:
Singer 6 (This character counts as cost 6 to sing songs.)
IT'S BEAUTIFUL, NO? When you play this character, you may play a song with cost 6 or less for free.

name: Vanellope von Schweetz
text:
Shift 2 (You may pay 2 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Vanellope von Schweetz.)
I HEREBY DECREE Whenever you play another Princess character, all opposing characters get -1 {S} until the start of your next turn.

name: Revive
text: Play a character with cost 5 or less from your discard for free.

name: Archimedes
text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Archimedes.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Challenger +3 (While challenging, this character gets +3 {S}.)

name: Olaf
text:
CLEAR THE PATH For each exerted character opponents have in play, you pay 1 {I} less to play this character.
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

name: Finders Keepers
text: Draw 3 cards.

name: Clarabelle
text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Clarabelle.)
KEEP IN STEP At the end of your turn, if chosen opponent has more cards in their hand than you, you may draw cards until you have the same number.

name: Scar
text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
LIFE'S NOT FAIR, IS IT? Whenever one of your characters challenges a damaged character, you may draw a card.

text:

Shuffle chosen character, item, or location into their player's deck. That player draws 2 cards.

RAGING DUCK While an opponent has 10 or more lore, this character gets +6 {S}.

name: Robin Hood
text: MY GREATEST PERFORMANCE Whenever this character quests, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal an action card with cost 6 or less and play it for free. Put the rest in your discard.

name: Ratigan's Party
text: MISFITS' REVELRY While you have a damaged character here, this location gets +2 {L}.

text:

KNIGHTED BY THE KING When you play this character, chosen character gains Challenger +2 and Resist +2 and can challenge ready characters this turn. (They get +2 {S} while challenging. Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

text: THERE'S NO ONE I'D RATHER BE THAN ME Villain characters gain “{E}, 3 {I} — Play a character with the same name as this character for free” while here.

name: Half Hexwell Crown
text:
AN UNEXPECTED FIND {E}, 2 {I} - Draw a card.
A PERILOUS POWER {E}, 2 {I}, Discard a card - Exert chosen character.
